alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 4:44PM CST until February 07 at 11:37PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Minor flooding is forecast on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...From this evening to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Lower Wetumpka Road starts to flood. Extensive flooding of low lands occurs and livestock and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 29.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
